name: In re the Nomination Papers of John HORNAMAN as Candidate for State Representative in the 3rd Legislative District. Appeal of Ebert Beeman
name_abbreviation: In re the Nomination Papers of Hornaman

judges: BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J, and CASTILLE, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, and BALDWIN, JJ.
parties: In re the Nomination Papers of John HORNAMAN as Candidate for State Representative in the 3rd Legislative District. Appeal of Ebert Beeman.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of April, 2006, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Lawrence M. Otter, Esq., Harrisburg, for Ebert Beeman.
Timothy D. McNair, Esq., Erie, for John Hornaman.
Louis Lawrence Boyle, Esq., for Bureau of Commissions, Elections and Legislation.
casebody.head_matter:
896 A.2d 568
In re the Nomination Papers of John HORNAMAN as Candidate for State Representative in the 3rd Legislative District. Appeal of Ebert Beeman.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 10, 2006.
Decided April 21, 2006.
Lawrence M. Otter, Esq., Harrisburg, for Ebert Beeman.
Timothy D. McNair, Esq., Erie, for John Hornaman.
Louis Lawrence Boyle, Esq., for Bureau of Commissions, Elections and Legislation.
BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J, and CASTILLE, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, and BALDWIN, JJ.
